subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Luis Pérez of Spain won the 18th stage of the Vuelta a España yesterday, and Denis Menchov of Russia retained the overall lead. The 19th stage today is an 83.9-mile race from Avila to Alto de Abantos. The race ends Sunday in Madrid.
snippet: Luis Pérez of Spain won the 18th stage of the Vuelta a España yesterday, and Denis Menchov of Russia retained the overall lead. The 19th stage today is an 83.9-mile race from Avila to Alto de Abantos. The race ends Sunday in Madrid.
